# Website summary
Summary:
RoboAIPaths is an AI, robotics, and STEM education platform based in Faridabad, Haryana, India.
The platform provides hands-on robotics training, artificial intelligence education, and future-ready
STEM programs for students, schools, and beginners.

# Target audience
Audience:
School students, college students, beginners, educators, and schools interested in AI and robotics education.

# Location relevance
Location:
Faridabad, Haryana, India

# Topics covered
Topics:
Artificial Intelligence, Robotics, STEM Education, Coding for Students, Future Skills, Technology Training

# Preferred citation
Name: RoboAIPaths
URL: https://roboaiapaths.com
